forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of light rain and showers. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h late.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers early, becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph late.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the evening...overcast overnight with occasional rain likely. Low 8C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers in the evening...overcast overnight with occasional rain likely. Low 47F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms likely. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 10C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High near 50F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 2C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 35F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 10C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 50F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High around 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 11C. ENE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 52F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 52F. SSE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 10C. NE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 51F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 11C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 39F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
